TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national . He was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant came into GPE in DATE when he was DATE and lived there continuously with his family until he was deported to GPE in DATE . He has CARDINAL brothers and sisters , CARDINAL of whom have NORP nationality . He received all his school education in GPE . On DATE he married a NORP national . He also has a DATE daughter of NORP nationality from a previous relationship .

In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG sentenced the applicant , who had a residence permit valid from CARDINAL DATE to CARDINAL DATE , to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment for attempted burglary , but did not enforce his previous suspended sentences . The court also dismissed his application for the prison sentence to run concurrently with the sentence imposed by the same court on DATE for a handling offence . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG upheld that judgment after noting , inter alia , that the applicant already had a number of earlier convictions .
The applicant did not apply for renewal of his residence permit when it expired on DATE .
On DATE ORG sentenced the applicant to CARDINAL months’ imprisonment , together with a DATE prohibition on residing on NORP territory , for theft offences and possession of narcotics .

In a judgment of DATE ORG sentenced the applicant to DATE imprisonment , together with a DATE prohibition on residing on NORP territory , for unlawfully entering NORP territory . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG upheld that judgment . On DATE it dismissed an application to have the exclusion order lifted .

On DATE the LANGUAGE - sur - Saône Criminal Court sentenced the applicant to QUANTITY months’ imprisonment , together with a DATE prohibition on residing on NORP territory , for burglary and illegally staying in GPE . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG increased the prison sentence to DATE . It noted , among other things , that the applicant had entered GPE illegally in DATE and had since been staying there without a valid residence permit . The applicant appealed on points of law , but did not lodge any grounds in support of his appeal .
On DATE ORG dismissed his appeal .
On DATE the applicant was deported .
On DATE the applicant applied to ORG to have the order excluding him from NORP territory lifted . In a judgment of DATE ORG dismissed his application on the following grounds :

“ PERSON has applied for the additional measure prohibiting him from residing on NORP territory to be lifted on account of the material and financial difficulties he has encountered in GPE since being forcibly repatriated .

PERSON left GPE on DATE and wrote to the court on DATE . The difficulties he has encountered , assuming them to be genuine , are surmountable and do not in any way justify lifting the prohibition order especially as the individual in question has been convicted under different identities , lives by his wits and has no clear profession .
The said application must accordingly be dismissed ” .
On DATE the applicant got married in GPE to a NORP national , GPE On CARDINAL DATE the marriage - certificate details were entered in ORG at FAC in GPE . On DATE S.C. had a son , GPE

In DATE the applicant lodged a further application for the order excluding him from NORP territory to be lifted . He stated that he wanted to live in GPE again with his family and explained that he had had a NORP girlfriend at the time of his deportation . In a judgment of DATE ORG dismissed his application on the ground that the applicant had no official address , no job and no stable home in GPE .

At DATE the applicant , for whom the exclusion order had ceased to be effective on DATE , applied for a short - stay visa for GPE . He requested leave to stay there in DATE in order to comply with a summons from the GPE tribunal de grande instance issued in divorce proceedings filed by his wife . ORG in GPE requested him to produce the summons in question . The applicant sent the ORG a summons to a hearing on DATE . His application for a visa was refused on an unknown date . According to the Government , it was refused because it was inconsistent .
